name: PotomacMillsRestaurants
0:
”Alexa, ask potomac mills restaurants to pick a restaurant”
”Alexa, ask potomac mills restaurants to pick a restaurant with mexican food”
”Alexa, ask potomac mills restaurants to pick a restaurant in stonebridge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: potomac mills restaurants
des: Alexa will select a restaurant in or around the Potomac Mills area for you. This includes places like the mall, Stonebridge, or the prince william parkway. Most of these restaurants are dine in while a couple are quick-service. You can search by area by asking "Alexa, ask potomac mills restaurants to pick a restaurant in stonebridge" or by type of food such as "Alexa, ask potomac mills restaurants to pick a restaurant with mexican food."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
